PACKAG 
 IDENT main
SCOLON 
IMPORT 
STRLIT glfw
SCOLON 
  FUNC 
 IDENT clickMouseEvents
LPAREN 
 IDENT window
   STR 
 COMMA 
 IDENT key
   I32 i32
 COMMA 
 IDENT action
   I32 i32
 COMMA 
 IDENT mods
   I32 i32
RPAREN 
LPAREN 
RPAREN 
LBRACE 
    IF 
   I32 i32
PERIOD 
 IDENT eq
LPAREN 
 IDENT key
 COMMA 
 IDENT glfw
PERIOD 
 IDENT MouseButtonLeft
RPAREN 
LBRACE 
    IF 
 IDENT action
  EQOP 
 IDENT glfw
PERIOD 
 IDENT Press
LBRACE 
 IDENT printf
LPAREN 
STRLIT clicked
RPAREN 
SCOLON 
   VAR 
 IDENT xxx
   F64 f64
SCOLON 
   VAR 
 IDENT yyy
   F64 f64
SCOLON 
 IDENT xxx
 COMMA 
 IDENT yyy
  ASGN =
 IDENT glfw
PERIOD 
 IDENT GetCursorPos
LPAREN 
 IDENT window
RPAREN 
SCOLON 
   F64 f64
PERIOD 
 IDENT print
LPAREN 
 IDENT xxx
RPAREN 
SCOLON 
RBRACE 
SCOLON 
RBRACE 
SCOLON 
RBRACE 
SCOLON 
  FUNC 
 IDENT main
LPAREN 
RPAREN 
LBRACE 
 IDENT clickMouseEvents
LPAREN 
STRLIT something
 COMMA 
INTLIT 10
 COMMA 
INTLIT 10
 COMMA 
INTLIT 10
RPAREN 
SCOLON 
RBRACE 
SCOLON
